attributes.action: what will happen if we leave the EU for  uk people who rely on Europe for work
attributes.additional_details: Many people in the arts field as an example work internationally and the prospect of leaving the EU will make it much harder to work , to move freely and will affect income drastically . Will the government please begin to discuss these ramifications ?
attributes.background: There is a lot of talk about leaving the EU, but what is not being discussed is how many UK people who work internationally will be affected . Please open up this issue and discuss it properly.

rejection.details: If you would like the House of Commons to debate this issue, you could start a new petition asking for a Commons debate on 'the consequences of leaving the EU for those who rely on the EU for work'.
